Introduction
This topic contains general information on eligibility to accrued benefits, including
definition of
substitution in case of death of claimant
original claimant
substitute claimant
, and
joint class
, and
right to waive substitution
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B  - Substitution in Case of Death of Claimant
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B
